# File lib/ramaze/reloader.rb, line 110
    def rotation
      files = [$0, __FILE__, *$LOADED_FEATURES].uniq
      paths = ['./', *$LOAD_PATH].uniq

      files.each do |file|
        next if file =~ @ignore
        if not @files.has_key?(file) and path = figure_path(file, paths)
          @files[file] = path
          yield path
        end
      end
    end
